en.name: AR-10 Surefire Warcomp 7.62x51 Flash Hider
en.description: The WarComp flash hider for AR-10-type weapon systems, manufactured by SureFire.

en.name: AR-10 Surefire SF3P 7.62x51 Flash Hider
en.description: The SureFire SF3P-762 three-prong flash hider, which fits AR-10 weapons and variants, features a greatly reduced muzzle flash. The SF3P-762 also serves as a rock-solid mounting adapter for SureFire SOCOM Series 7.62mm Fast-Attach sound suppressors.

en.name: AR-15 Surefire Closed Tine 5.56x45 Flash Hider
en.description: SureFire adapters serve as rock-solid, precision mounting platforms for SureFire SOCOM Fast-Attach Suppressors, as well as, serving as a standalone muzzle device. The SFCT-556-1/2-28 closed-tine adapter closely represents a traditional birdcage flash hider, with wrench flats for easy installation.

en.name: AR-15 Surefire SFMB 5.56x45 Muzzle brake
en.description: SureFire SFMB muzzle brake suppressor adapters greatly reduce both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that your weapon tracks straight back, keeping you on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. Our proprietary Impulse Diffusion design minimizes side blast and rear-directed concussion effects.

en.name: AR-10 Surefire SFMB 7.62x51 Muzzle brake
en.description: SureFire SFMB muzzle brake suppressor adapters greatly reduce both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that your weapon tracks straight back, keeping you on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. Our proprietary Impulse Diffusion design minimizes side blast and rear-directed concussion effects.

en.name: AR-15 Surefire Warcomp Closed Tine 5.56x45 flash Hider
en.description: If a traditional birdcage flash hider is what you want, SureFire’s WARCOMP-556-CTN significantly reduces muzzle flash with every shot fired and helps reduce muzzle rise for easier target tracking and faster follow-up shots. Its closed tines reduce the chance you'll snag your barrel in environments where there is dense vegetation or other items that might catch an open-tine flash hider.

en.name: AR-15 Surefire Eliminator 5.56x45 Flash Hider
en.description: The advanced SureFire 3P Eliminator three-prong flash hider features a patent-pending design that greatly reduces muzzle flash — typically greater than 99% — when compared with a plain muzzle.

en.name: AR-10 Surefire Eliminator 7.62x51 Flash Hider
en.description: The advanced SureFire 3P Eliminator three-prong flash hider features a patent-pending design that greatly reduces muzzle flash — typically greater than 99% — when compared with a plain muzzle.

en.name: AR-15 Surefire ProComp 5.56x45 muzzle brake
en.description: SureFire ProComps take the standalone muzzle brake to the proverbial next level. The ProComp 556 fits M4/M16 weapons and variants with 1/2-28 muzzle threads.

en.name: SureFire SFMB .338 LM muzzle brake
en.description: SureFire SFMB muzzle brake suppressor adapters greatly reduce both recoil impulse and muzzle rise so that your weapon tracks straight back, keeping you on target for faster shot-to-shot recovery. Our proprietary Impulse Diffusion design minimizes side blast and rear-directed concussion effects. Precision machined from U.S. mill-certified heat-treated stainless steel bar stock and DLC-coated for extreme durability, they are available for a variety of weapon calibers and muzzle thread specs, and every SFMB serves as a rock-solid mounting adapter for SureFire’s combat-proven SOCOM Series Fast-Attach® suppressors. The SFMB design incorporates multiple bearing surfaces to ensure superior suppressor alignment. Blind pilot holes at the 3 o’ clock and 9 o’clock positions enable fine-tuning of recoil characteristics for individual shooting styles or ammunition characteristics.

en.name: AR-15 Huxwrx QD 5.56x45 Flash Hider
en.description: The Flash Hider-QD 556 is designed to mitigate flash when unsuppressed. It is compatible with HX-QD series (556k, 556, 762, 762 Ti and Magnum Ti) and FLOW series (556k and 762 Ti) suppressors.

en.name: AR-15 Strike Industries Cookie Cutter 5.56x45 Muzzle Brake
en.description: Based on the theory, law of action and reaction (Newton's 3rd law), Strike Industries created a large reflecting area to enlarge great "reaction" to eliminate recoil force. The COOKIE CUTTER COMP is, hands down, the best muzzle brake for compensating muzzle rise and recoil on Short Barrel Rifles (SBR's) and AR-Pistols. It is NOT a flash suppressor. This muzzle brake is GUARANTEED to make every single person near you at the range want to perforate your skull.

en.name: AR-10 Strike Industries Cookie Cutter 7.62x51 Muzzle Brake
en.description: Based on the theory, law of action and reaction (Newton's 3rd law), Strike Industries created a large reflecting area to enlarge great "reaction" to eliminate recoil force. The COOKIE CUTTER COMP is, hands down, the best muzzle brake for compensating muzzle rise and recoil on Short Barrel Rifles (SBR's) and AR-Pistols. It is NOT a flash suppressor. This muzzle brake is GUARANTEED to make every single person near you at the range want to perforate your skull.

en.name: Strike Industries Cookie Cutter 9x19 Muzzle Brake
en.description: Based on the theory, law of action and reaction (Newton's 3rd law), Strike Industries created a large reflecting area to enlarge great "reaction" to eliminate recoil force. The COOKIE CUTTER COMP is, hands down, the best muzzle brake for compensating muzzle rise and recoil on Short Barrel Rifles (SBR's) and AR-Pistols. It is NOT a flash suppressor. This muzzle brake is GUARANTEED to make every single person near you at the range want to perforate your skull.

en.name: Cadex Defense MX1 7.62x51 Muzzle Brake
en.description: This model P/N: 3850-028. The Cadex MX1 muzzle brake is designed to deflect the muzzle blast away from the shooter and his spotter. Gases exit sideways and upwards to reduce felt recoil, dust cloud and improve rifle control. It will soften your 338 Lapua recoil as if it was a 243 Win. Self-timing design using a pinch bolt.

en.name: Cadex Defense MX1 .338 LM Muzzle Brake
en.description: This model P/N: 3850-024. The Cadex MX1 muzzle brake is designed to deflect the muzzle blast away from the shooter and his spotter. Gases exit sideways and upwards to reduce felt recoil, dust cloud and improve rifle control. It will soften your 338 Lapua recoil as if it was a 243 Win. Self-timing design using a pinch bolt.

en.name: AR-10 Gemtech ETM 3 port 7.62x51 Muzzle Brake
en.description: The ETM muzzle brake from Gemtech with 3 ports to help mitigate recoil while used in a standalone configuration, however when used with a suppressor has a mechanism for attaching suppressors without risk of carbon locking. Perfect length for pinning and welding to a 14.5 inch barrel.

en.name: KAC MAMS 5.56x45 muzzle brake
en.description: The KAC 5.56 MAMS (Multi-Axis Muzzle Stability) Brake has been engineered to increase controllability, to significantly reduce felt recoil, and to help mitigate a rifle’s flash signature as compared to traditional muzzle brake designs. The MAMS is a neutral bias brake that combats both muzzle rise and drift upon firing.

en.name: Phase 5 FATman Hex Brake 7.62x51 muzzle brake
en.description: The FATman Hex Brake was created to solve issues faced by many competition shooters and precision rifle builders. The 2 large (FAT) ventilated baffle sections and chambers create the compensation needed to reduce the overall recoil felt by the shooter. The FATman Hex Brake includes two top ports machined at a 20 Deg. forward directed angle.

en.name: AR-15 Colt XM-177E2 5.56x45 flash hider
en.description: The original XM177E2 flash hider made by Colt for the Gau-5A rifles requested by the United States Air Force and other special forces units in the 60's and 70's.

en.name: AR-15 KAC Enhanced Compensator 5.56x45 Flash Suppressor Kit
en.description: The KAC 5.56 Enhanced Compensator Kit also known as the "Triple Tap" or "3T" has been engineered to increase controllability, to significantly reduce felt recoil, and to help mitigate a rifle’s flash signature as compared to traditional muzzle brake designs.

en.name: AR-15 CGS SCI-SIX 5.56x45 flash hider
en.description: A flash hider designed by Irregular Defense and produced by CGS for their SCI-SIX suppressor.
